name: On the Frontier
description:
Vision Document: https://docs.google.com/document/d/136vR5P46u-3f9-Unatm8z7nko2u1_Kr66fldto7XZ70/...

On the Frontier is a third-person exploratory experience of a Medieval Fantasy town mashed together with a Western theme. A sandstorm has recently blown through town, making a mess of things. Have a look around and see if you can help out!

This project was made using Unity and several Unity assets, featuring Pixel Crushers Dialogue Systems: https://www.pixelcrushers.com/dialogue-system/ This project also used Unity's terrain system, character setup,  level design and asset placement, and a fair bit of creative writing. 

Click here for a full list of assets used in the project: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1BnEfN_adUrsZACoYWziU0JhGvnaETcESi5sai2dIbu0/...
